title: Green Onion Smashed Potatoes
ingredients: - 8 tablespoons (1 stick) unsalted butter, at room temperature
- ¾ cup crème fraîche or sour cream
- 6 green onions, green and white parts, thinly sliced
directions: 1. Put the potatoes in a large pot and cover by 1 inch with cold water. Add 1 tablespoon salt and bring to a simmer over high heat. Cook until the potatoes are tender when pierced with a knife, 12 to 15 minutes. Drain and return to the pot.

2. Mix together the butter and crème fraîche in a bowl and season liberally with salt and pepper. Using a wooden spoon, gently smash the potatoes while folding in the crème fraîche mixture. Fold in the green onions and season with more salt and pepper if needed. Transfer to a serving bowl.
